data.name: BookPracticeFinished
data.value:
You have correctly translated all words successively for multiple times.
Hint: In the settings you can configure how often a word has to be correctly translated in turn before it is marked as learnt.

data.name: BookPracticeFinishedT
data.value: Congratulations!

data.name: BrowseVhfPath
data.value: Please select the default folder for your vocabulary books.

data.name: CsvExportError
CsvExportSave
data.value: Do you want to save your changes before exporting a CSV file? You can save your changes later on. Vocup always exports the current version including any unsafed changes.

data.name: CsvExportSaveT
data.value: Save now?

data.name: CsvImportError
CsvInvalidHeader
data.value: The CSV header could not be read. Please ensure that the file is not empty.

data.name: CsvInvalidHeaderColumns
data.value: The CSV header consists of {0} column but has to be exactly 2 columns. Please ensure the CSV file to be exported with Excel using UTF-8 format. Files exported by older versions of Vocup are not compatible anymore.

data.name: CsvInvalidHeaderT
data.value: Invalid CSV header

data.name: CsvInvalidLanguages
data.value: Do you want to import an {0} - {1} vocabulary book although the languages do not match your vocabulary book? If {0} and {1} are vocabulary words and no languages, please remember to fill the first row of the CSV file with your mother tongue in left column and your foreign language in the right column.

data.name: EditAddDuplicate
data.value: This vocabulary word already exists in your vocabulary book. Do you want to discard your input?

data.name: EditDuplicateT
data.value: Word already exists

data.name: EditToDuplicate
data.value: The changed vocabulary word already exists in your vocabulary book. Do you want to delete this word?

data.name: GeneralSaveChanges
data.value: Do you want to save your changes and/or practice results?

data.name: GeneralSaveChangesT
data.value: Save?

data.name: LegacyVersionUninstall
data.value: An outdated version of Vocup has been found on your computer. This could prevent automatic file type association configuration and could cause vocabulary books failing to open. Do you want to uninstall this outdated version?

data.name: LegacyVersionUninstallT
data.value: Uninstall incompatible version?

data.name: MergeOverride
data.value: A vocabulary book file from the same path has already been loaded. Do you want to load the current vocabulary book and override existing data?

data.name: MergeOverrideT
data.value: Override data?

data.name: OpenInExplorerError
data.value: The current vocabulary book could not be opened in Explorer. Please be aware that this feature is not avalaible on some operatening systems like Linux or Windows 10 S. Details: {0}

data.name: OpenInExplorerErrorT
data.value: Error when opening in Explorer

data.name: OpenInExplorerNotFound
data.value: The vocabulary book file at {0} does not exist anymore.

data.name: OpenInExplorerNotFoundT
data.value: File not found

data.name: OpenInExplorerSave
data.value: Do you want to save your changes to the vocabulary book before opening it in the Explorer? You can save your changes later in every case.

data.name: OpenInExplorerSaveT
data.value: Save now?

data.name: OpenUnknownFile
data.value: Vocup cannot open the file at {0} because it is neither a vocabulary book file nor a Vocup backup file.

data.name: OpenUnknownFileT
data.value: Unknown file format

data.name: SettingsRestartRequired
data.value: To apply all changed settings, you have to restart Vocup.

data.name: SettingsRestartRequiredT
data.value: Restart required

data.name: SpecialCharAlreadyExists
data.value: There are already special chars for this language

data.name: SpecialCharCorruptedFile
data.value: The special char file for {0} could not be loaded. Please check the file at {1} and delete it if necessary.

data.name: SpecialCharCorruptedFileT
data.value: Corrupted file

data.name: SpecialCharDeleteError
data.value: An error occured when deleting the special char file for {0}: {1}

data.name: SpecialCharDeleteErrorT
data.value: Error when deleting

data.name: SpecialCharSaveError
data.value: An error occured when saving the special char file for {0}: {1}

data.name: SpecialCharSaveErrorT
data.value: Error when saving

data.name: UnexpectedErrorT
data.value: Unexpected error

data.name: VdpCorruptFile
data.value: The Vocup backup file is corrupt and could not be opened: {0}

data.name: VdpCorruptFileT
data.value: Corrupt file

data.name: VdpRestored
data.value: Summary - {0} File(s) restored - {1} File(s) skipped - {2} File(s) failed

data.name: VdpRestoredT
data.value: Recovery finished

data.name: VhfCorruptFile
data.value: The vocabulary book file is corrupt and could not be opened.

data.name: VhfCorruptFileT
data.value: Corrupt vocabulary book file

data.name: VhfInvalidLanguages
data.value: Mother tongue and foreign language could not be read from the vocabulary book file or are identical. Please ensure that the file is not empty.

data.name: VhfInvalidRow
data.value: An entry of this vocabulary book file is invalid. Therefore the file cannot be opened.

data.name: VhfInvalidVersion
data.value: The version field of the vocabulary book file could not be read. Please ensure that the file is not empty.

data.name: VhfInvalidVhrCode
data.value: The result file reference of the vocabulary book file could not be read. Please ensure that the file is not empty.

data.name: VhfMustUpdate
data.value: The vocabulary book file requires a later version of Vocup. Please search for updates inside the application or on the Internet.

data.name: VhfMustUpdateT
data.value: Update required

data.name: VhrCorruptFile
data.value: The result file is corrupt and going to be deleted. Therefore you are going to loose your practice results.

data.name: VhrCorruptFileT
data.value: Corrupt result file

data.name: VhrInvalidRowCount
data.value: The referenced result file does not match the current vocabulary book. All results are going to be deleted.

data.name: VhrInvalidRowCountAndOtherFile
data.value: The referenced result file is in use by another vocabulary book. Results are not going to be loaded.

data.name: VocupFileWriteError
data.value: A vocabulary book or result file could not be saved.

data.name: VocupFileWriteErrorEx
data.value: A vocabulary book or result file could not be saved: {0}

data.name: VocupFileWriteErrorT
data.value: Error when saving
